channel.title: 3 questions helms, dark bows, and prayer
channel.description:
First I'd like to thank you for taking the time to read my stupid questions.
1: Almost every helm on my server, player's heads show through the helm..any ideas on how to fix this?
2: How can I make the darkbow normal hits hit twice like on real rs?
3: Anyone know a full prayer tutorial? (or close to full)
Thanks to anyone who can help with any of these =D

item.title: 3 questions helms, dark bows, and prayer
item.dc:creator: @Pancakebuddyy Pancakebuddyy
item.description:
@Pancakebuddyy wrote:

Ok thanks! That works great.

Now for 2 and 3…

#1 - Put the helmet Id in FullHelm, FullMask, and Hat
